name: Diverting Vortex
summary: You transfer vestiges of magical energy to the air around you, creating a vortex that deflects ranged attacks.
description: You transfer vestiges of magical energy to the air around you, creating a vortex that deflects ranged attacks. Until the start of your next turn, you gain a +1 status bonus to AC against ranged weapon attacks and physical ranged unarmed attacks.
